Heroimage.textPart1: ...is a platform for effective, fast, and engaging learning
Heroimage.textPart2: of programming through practice and competition

ContentTop.title: What can you learn?
ContentTop.platformDescription1: Codebusters will allow you to learn and practice Front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript in practice!
ContentTop.platformDescription2: You can solve tasks, climb the rankings, achieve levels of knowledge in various technologies, and even export your results and show them off!

ContentBottom.title: Over 400 students from across the country have trusted us
ContentBottom.text: We develop educational products, run a programming academy, create software for commercial clients, conduct body leasing, and promote sports
